Description:
Renovated for family success
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY | Enjoy inviting modern family-sized space in this magnificently renovated home, presenting as new with quality fittings and stylish furnishings throughout the impeccable double storey floorplan. Nestled in a tightly held, street-proud cul de sac and crafted to engage light and the glorious surrounding green aspect of the neighbouring Hochkins Flora Reserve. Every domain has been functionally designed to indulge relaxation, everyday living and entertaining. Comprising separate formal zone culminating in expansive open configuration with showstopper kitchen boasting double Asko steam ovens and induction cooktop, Miele integrated dishwasher, waterfall benchtops, excellent soft-close cabinetry storage and double sink. The modern vibe of this space is encapsulated by atmospheric pendant lighting and a subway tile splashback. Enjoy a Sunday brunch at the breakfast bar or winter's evening curled around the open log fire (stone stacked façade) in the merging family/dining space. Just when you thought it couldn't get any better, step outside to a brilliantly devised alfresco wrap around blackbutt deck, beautifully landscaped with recycled early 1900's rail bridge posts, glass fencing and upscaled with BI bar heaters, LED lighting and a central skylight to host any occasion on any day of the year. Established grassed gardens provide further allure for families with children and pets.
Accommodating 5 bedrooms, a study and 3 bathrooms plus a powder room, all with black matte tapware and custom designed floating timber stone topped vanities.
A solid timber staircase wrapped in glass is highlighted by a stunning trio of lights, ascending to 3 pristine bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. A generous master suite invites an incredible leafy vista from a huge bay window, displaying fully fitted WIR and dual vanity ensuite with rainfall shower and recessed shelving. The fully tiled family bathroom offers a luxe spa bath.
The location is incredible, just a short stroll to Yarra Road PS and minutes to buses delivering you to Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Additionally, near-by to Croydon Hills PS, Good Shepherd PS and Rudolf Steiner School. Close to Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres, McAdams Square cafes/shops. Moments to native walking tracks and 18 acres approx of indigenous parkland. Close connections to Yarra Valley wineries, public transport and freeway/Eastlink.
Family will relish the comprehensively appointed layout providing dual evaporative cooling systems (zoned), gas ducted heating, LED lighting, quality flooring and window furnishings, storage incl WI linen cupboard in fully updated laundry and triple car garaging with internal access from SLUG plus OSP on driveway.
